General.Name: Bioter S.A.
General.Description: Bioter S.A. operates as a technical construction company in Greece and internationally. The company is involved in the execution of various projects, such as roads, ports, industrial-energy, electromechanical-communications, airports, war industries factories, etc., as well as private projects, such as offices, banks, bus stations, etc. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Athens, Greece.
